list_definition.definition: a thin sheet made from a hard material that is used as a pattern for cutting other materials in the same shape

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He used a metal template to cut out the circle.

list_definition.definition: something that is used as a model for producing another similar thing

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The film was the template for many Westerns that came after it.

list_definition.definition: a computer document which is used as a model for creating similar documents because it contains all the basic features required.
